DOC.detailed_description: The overall prevalence metabolic syndrome general US population estimate 22-34.5 % great prevalence certain population ( e.g . Mexican African Americans , woman ) . These number consistent rise prevalence obesity US population 34.9 % , remain stable last 10 year . Veterans particularly predispose metabolic syndrome since prevalence obesity much high among rank . Since annual medical cost obese metabolic syndrome $ 1429 high healthy weight , impact cost healthcare Veterans potentially tremendous . This mainly since obesity strongly associate many chronic disease , include type 2 diabetes , cardiovascular disease , type cancer ( endometrial , postmenopausal breast , kidney , colon ) , musculoskeletal disorder , sleep apnea , gallbladder disease . In order combat obesity epidemic Veterans , U.S. Department Veterans Affairs create MOVE ! Weight Management Program ( MOVE ! ) 2006 . MOVE ! evidence-based weight-management program design patient follow primary care clinic BMI ≥30kg/m2 BMI ≥25kg/m2 1 obesity-related condition ( e.g . diabetes , hypertension , dyslipidemia ) . The efficacy program measure % patient lose least 5 % body weight 8 week 6 month first session . In addition , TeleMOVE ! program recently initiate within VA system help individual make VA MOVE ! program due work schedule distance VA clinic .
